name: Uddhar Multipurpose Society, Yavatmal
briefDescription: Udhhar is a registered society, registered in 2010. We are focusing on 2 important districts of Maharashtra namely Yavatmal and Gadchiroli. We are working on the suicide prevention of Farmers in Yavatmal District and focusing on health and education in Gadchiroli. We have served 2200 people so far with the team of committed people. We ensure transparent dealing through our organization.
